item.title: Velora: A Voice-Controlled mHealth Application with Adaptive User Interface for Elderly Users
item.description: A Doctor Appointment App that features accessibility options like voice control, bilingual support, adjustable elements and colorblind mode, alongside core functions such as appointment booking and health reminders.
